name: array
description: Creates a new array populated with any arguments that have been passed to the function.
discouraged: Lucee recommends to use the inline array notation.

params.name: values
params.description: One or more values that can be used in the initialization of the array.

examples.title: Example
examples.description: Creates and dump a new array.

examples.title: Inline Array Notation Example
examples.description: Creates and dump a new array.
